text:
Wow , what a great find. I had the shrimp and fish taco's - They were great. Large helping , if you are not too hungry I would suggest one Taco. Tried the homemade French fries - They too were amazing. 

Will definitely be back.
Finally found the fish and chips I was looking for!! High quality fillets, wonderfully breaded. I didn't get the fries this time. Just the fillet. I'll try them next time! So good!
The shrimp and fish tacos are amazing as well as the fish and chips. Everything is really fresh, quick service and friendly staff!
Fresh food, quick friendly service & reasonable prices. I would highly recommend Joeys urban to satisfy taco and poutine cravings!
